# displayName

**Instance Property**

A human-readable string that displays the name of a printer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var displayName: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a name that describes the printer’s manufacturer and model number to display in the app’s user interface. If `nil`, the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrinterDestination/txtRecord] property can produce the display name.

## Describing the printer

- **txtRecord**: A DNS TXT record to identify the printer.
- **url**: The address of the printer.
